channel.title: 508 ban command error?
channel.description:
.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:800: cannot find symbol symbol : method appendToBanned(java.lang.String) location: class Bulby.players.Player p2.appendToBanned(victim); ^ 1 error
any idea what i have to do to fix that?

item.title: 508 ban command error?
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

else if (cmd[0].equals(“banuser”)) {
String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" “) + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.disconnected[0] = true;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You have just Banned " + p2.username+”.”);
p2.appendToBanned(victim);
p2.frames.showInterface(p2, 999999999);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
p.updateReq = true;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}

Theres my code where would i put it?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 ban command error?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

You did not define “p2”, Just define it…like so…

Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];

Put that into your command.
